title: Famicom: Nintendo Family Computer HVC-001
material_description: Video game console with game controllers.  Includes original box with transformer, power cord and computer user manual. Object display only and not functioning
brief_description: Famicom Nintendo Family Computer HVC-001 video games console unit. Red and white plastic computer unit with two gaming controllers attached by black power cords. Controllers have ports designed to rest them either side of the unit. Console comes in original packaging (box) with RF switch, power cable and manual. The manual is written in foreign language
